__e: I'm not sure what's causing your tremors, but... this is just what happened with John right before it got really bad.
I mean, if you wanted to, couldn't you just say that the reason everything's happened is because of one thing that happened at the very, very, very beginning of time.
You're the one who's been behind the lies all these years.
The little country that started the great war.
I think they're responsible for the four girls who disappeared last month.
Did you have my mom killed?
But he says... that the victim started the fight.
So the question is, what are you so angry about?
I'm kind of responsible for the celebration.
So, you got any ideas about what's causing all this?
Mum... And I know the seeds of what happened the night your husband lost his life...
No, but I figured out it's not the light, so I'm going over the blueprints to find out where the real problem is.
- The book is a non-fiction look at the roots of domestic evil.
Not if it's a problem you created.
